effect.black_white: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

flavor_text.black_white: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.
